pkgmetadata.longdescription: # PyWebHostPython-based All-in-One Webserver,Handles both `Websocket` and oridnary HTTP Requests## DemoThe included demo program,`demo.py`,serves as both a `Websocket` server and a HTTP File server.`usage:demo.py [address] [port]`## UsageYou got the demo,and that's pretty much enough lol
